featured.text: Modern flip-flops derive from Japanese zōris, which were often worn with socks dividing the big toe from the rest, and were typically made of rice straw.

definition.zh_def: 襪子，一種用於覆蓋和保護腳部的衣物。
definition.en_def: A piece of clothing worn on the feet, typically made of fabric, that covers the foot and often extends up the leg.
definition.example: I put on a warm pair of socks before going outside.
